meanings.sent1: I live in a small town.
meanings.sent3: I can't believe how many plants live in my garden!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter made the room come alive.
meanings.sent5: The memories of that day will live in my heart forever.

meanings.definition: To make one's home in a particular place.
meanings.sent2: They live in a cozy cottage by the lake.
meanings.sent3: I never thought I would live in a treehouse!
meanings.sent4: The music seemed to live in the old house.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of the forest truly lives in this tree.

meanings.sent3: I never thought I would live to see a unicorn!
meanings.sent4: The excitement of the city lived in her eyes.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset lived in that moment.

meanings.definition: To broadcast or perform in real time.
meanings.sent1: The concert will be live on TV.
meanings.sent2: They will live stream the event online.
meanings.sent3: I can't wait to see the live cooking show!
meanings.sent4: The emotions of the actors truly live on stage.
meanings.sent5: The energy of the crowd made the performance come alive.
